allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(ui\): add collapsible and searchable checklists

- Checklists now collapsible with expand/collapse toggle
- Search input filters items across all checklists in real-time
- Yellow highlight on matching text
- "Expand All" / "Collapse All" button
- Shows filtered count when searching

Also includes:
- Worker infrastructure for background processing \(TaskCoordinator, WorkerPool, TaskQueue, RateLimiter\)
- AgentOrchestrator background mode support
- CLAUDE.md with post-implementation instructions
- Updated TODO.md with optimization tasks
- Version bump to 0.3.5

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
